thread.title: Photo exhibition to celebrate 100 years of British Vogue
thread.title_full: Photo exhibition to celebrate 100 years of British Vogue

title: Photo exhibition to celebrate 100 years of British Vogue
text:
| Updated: Sep 08, 2015 19:26 IST Emma Watson is the cover star for Britsh Vogue's September issue. The actor and UN campaigner appears for the second time on the cover. (Twitter Photo) 
Cond√© Nast-published fashion bible Vogue has announced it is to stage a celebratory exhibition at the National Portrait Gallery (NPG) in London's west end. 
Vogue 100: A Century of Style will run from February 11 to May 22, 2016 and will celebrate the sheer breadth and depth of the title's photography since its UK launch in 1916. 
Curated by the NPG, the show will feature some 280 individual images, drawn from both the publication's own archives and from individual private collections that, when brought together, will tell the story of Vogue in Great Britain and its influence on fashion, style and culture over the past century. Tags
